## FormSubmitHandler type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type FormSubmitHandler<TFieldValues extends FieldValues> = (payload: {
    data: TFieldValues;
    event?: React.BaseSyntheticEvent;
    formData: FormData;
    formDataJson: string;
    method?: 'post' | 'put' | 'delete';
}) => unknown | Promise<unknown>;
```
